      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      String commissionShip​(String nme)
      Allows a ship to be comissioned to the admiral's fleet, if there is enough money in the War Chest for the commission fee.The ship's state is set to "active"
      void decommissionShip​(String nme)
      Removes a ship from the fleet to the reserves, if they are in the fleet pre-condition: isInAdmiralsFleet(nme)
      String fightEncounter​(int encNo)
      Retrieves the encounter represented by the encounter number.Finds a ship from the fleet which can fight the encounter.
      String findShipInReserve​(String nme)
      Returns details of a reserve ship with the given name
      String getAllEncounters()
      Provides a String representation of all encounters
      String getEncounter​(int num)
      Provides a String representation of an encounter given by the encounter number
      String getFleet()
      Returns a String representation of the ships in the admiral's fleet or the message "No ships hired"
      double getMoney()
      returns the amount of money in the War Chest
      String getReserves()
      Returns a String representation of all ships in the reserves
      String getShip​(String nme)
      Returns details of any ship with the given name
      String getSunkShips()  
      boolean isDefeated()
      returns true if War Chest <=0 and the admiral's fleet has no ships which can be decommissioned.
      boolean isEncounter​(int num)
      returns true if the number represents a encounter
      boolean isInAdmiralsFleet​(String nme)
      Returns true if the ship with the name is in the admiral's fleet, false otherwise.
      Admiral loadGame​(String fname)
      reads all information about the game from the specified file and returns an Admiral object
      void recommissionShip​(String nme)
      Restores a ship to the fleet by setting their state to AVAILABLE
      void saveGame​(String fname)
      Writes whole game to the specified file
      String toString()
      Returns a String representation of the state of the game, including the name of the admiral, state of the warChest, whether defeated or not, and the ships currently in the fleet,(or, "No ships" if fleet is empty)

        public String commissionShip​(String nme)
        Allows a ship to be comissioned to the admiral's fleet, if there is enough money in the War Chest for the commission fee.The ship's state is set to "active"
        Specified by:
        commissionShip in interface WAM
        Parameters:
        nme - represents the name of the ship
        Returns:
        "Ship commissioned" if ship is commissioned, "Not found" if ship not found, "Not available" if ship is not in the reserve, "Not enough money" if not enough money in the warChest

      • fightEncounter

        public String fightEncounter​(int encNo)
        Retrieves the encounter represented by the encounter number.Finds a ship from the fleet which can fight the encounter. The results of fighting an encounter will be one of the following: “Encounter won by...(ship reference and name)“ – add plunder to War Chest and ship's state is set to RESTING, “Encounter lost as no ship available” – deduct plunder from the War Chest,“Encounter lost on battle skill level and (ship name) sunk/lost" - deduct plunder from War Chest and ship state set to sunk. If an encounter is lost and admiral is completely defeated, add “You have been defeated ” to the output. Ensure that the state of the war chest is also included in the return message.
        Specified by:
        fightEncounter in interface WAM
        Parameters:
        encNo - is the number of the encounter
        Returns:
        a String showing the result of fighting the encounter

      • getEncounter

        public String getEncounter​(int num)
        Provides a String representation of an encounter given by the encounter number
        Specified by:
        getEncounter in interface WAM
        Parameters:
